sentences.english: The Donner party finally made it through the Wasatch Mountains and arrived at the Great Salt Lake.
sentences.chinese: 唐纳之队最终穿越了瓦扎茨山脉，到达了大盐湖。

sentences.english: His death was announced by the University of Utah in Salt Lake City, where Dr.
sentences.chinese: 盐湖城犹他大学宣布了科尔夫博士去世的消息。

sentences.english: One is called the City Center Lofts in Salt Lake City, Utah.

sentences.english: Qinghai Lake is the biggest salt lake in China.
sentences.chinese: 青海湖是中国最大的一个盐湖。

sentences.english: Copper and copper alloy showed better anticorrosion performance in salt-lake than in seawater.
sentences.chinese: 铜合金在盐湖表现比海水更好的适应性。

sentences.english: There are 14 saline lakes in the Dingbian saline lake areas.

sentences.english: In recent years, the utilization of salt lake resources in Ei Salar de Atacama have been getting rapid progress.

sentences.english: A large portion of the eastern Salt Lake, Mongolian Qaidam meaning that the salt marshes.

sentences.english: Photo and caption by George Stavrinos.This photo was taken during a sunset at the Larnaca saltlake, Cyprus.

sentences.english: Such a special geologic and geographic setting is known as a "dry salt lake" .
sentences.chinese: 这种特殊的地质地埋背景称为“干盐湖”。

sentences.english: Yuncheng Salt Lake is the first salt lake developed by ancient Chinese people.
